org.treetank.io

Interface IBackendWriter

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBackendReader
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BerkeleyWriter, FileWriter, JCloudsWriter

    public interface IBackendWriter
extends IBackendReader
    Interface to provide the abstract layer related to write access of the tt-backend.
    Author:
    Sebastian Graf, University of Konstanz

    • Method Summary
